data.title: Residence Inn Orlando at FLAMINGO CROSSINGS® Town Center
data.meta_description: Experience the convenience of Residence Inn Orlando at FLAMINGO CROSSINGS® Town Center and enjoy suite-style comfort, free breakfast, and free shuttle transportation to Walt Disney World® Resort.
data.text:
Extended-stay hotel minutes away from the magic.

The Residence Inn Orlando at FLAMINGO CROSSINGS Town Center is a brand new, all-suite extended-stay hotel in Orlando, Florida. We are conveniently located near the western entrance of Walt Disney World® Resort. We provide an ample workspace, free Wi-Fi, and a 24-hour business center to help keep you focused. Enjoy amenities like a free full breakfast buffet daily, a 24/7 fitness center, an outdoor resort-style pool, backyard multi-sport courts, an on-site poolside bar and restaurant, and pet-friendly suites. In your suite, you will find all the comforts of home with plush bedding, 55” TV”s and streaming capabilities. Make your favorite meals with our fully equipped kitchens with a refrigerator, microwave, stovetop, dishwasher, coffee maker, and cooking utensils. Our spacious suites with living and dining areas are perfect for extended stays for family vacations, temporary housing, or business travel. We look forward to welcoming you at Residence Inn Orlando at FLAMINGO CROSSINGS Town Center.
